name: Ninja Bomb Squad
description:
Ninja Bomb Squad was made for Ludum Dare 51 with the theme of 'every 10 seconds'

Every 10 seconds bombs will explode if you haven't destroyed them first so you have to be quick to destroy them (we don't talk about the logistics of slicing bombs to diffuse them). if no bombs are left you go to the next level where there are more bombs on a 10 second timer.

Controls - keyboard - controller:

Move - WASD or arrow keys - left thumbstick
Dodge - Space bar - Joystick button 0 (A on xbox)
Attack - left mouse button - joystick button 2 (X on xbox)
